t: Johnson Paste Wax | The International Association of Penturners
s: What a bummer, just found out this isn’t available anymore, discontinued a few years ago. I think this was pretty much a staple item in any wood shop. I did find a new can on eBay, for $95.00, at that price I’ll find an alternative, but I still have a little left.
